formElement.label: Klocwork root:
formElement.documentation: Root directory on which Klocwork's files are stored, otherwise default will be assumed

formElement.label: Project name:
formElement.documentation: Name of the project that will be created, deleted or loaded.

formElement.label: Language:
formElement.documentation: Specify one or more languages of the source code for this project. Valid arguments are c, cxx, csharp and java. Multiple arguments can be specified, separated by a comma (for example language c,java).

formElement.label: Verbose mode
formElement.documentation: Displays output information about program execution.

formElement.label: Tables directory:
formElement.documentation: Specifies the location where you want to store the project's tables
